scripts.copy: mkdir -p dist/assets/game/states dist/assets/shared && tl run teal/build/copy.tl
scripts.cleanup: find src/assets -type f -name '*.lua' -delete && find src/assets -type d -empty -delete
scripts.build: cyan build && esbuild src/index.js --bundle --platform=node --loader:.wasm=file --outfile=dist/index.js && npm run copy && npm run cleanup
scripts.start: npm run build && npm run run
